com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface SystemResource


  • @Path(value="/system")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface SystemResource
    System Resource Interface V1. Endpoints that are restricted to System Admins only.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • recomputeHistoricalBillingFor

        @POST
 @Path(value="/vcd/{locationId}/recompute-billing")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
void recomputeHistoricalBillingFor(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                          String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                          RecomputeBillingSpec rbs)
        Recompute and store the historical billing for all orgs in a given location and month. This also recomputes the billing for all entities (VDC, vApp, and VMs) below the org.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        rbs - RecomputeBillingSpec recompute billing spec

      • resubmitConnectwiseInvoicesFor

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/resubmit-invoices")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
void resubmitConnectwiseInvoicesFor(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                       String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                       RecomputeBillingSpec spec)
        Re-submit billing invoices for all orgs in a given location and month.
        Parameters:
        locationId - String location ID
        spec - RecomputeBillingSpec re-submit invoice spec

      • recomputeHistoricalBillingFor

        @POST
 @Path(value="/vcd/{locationId}/org/{orgUuid}/recompute-billing")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
void recomputeHistoricalBillingFor(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                                        String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                        String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                        RecomputeBillingSpec rbs)
        Recompute and store the historical billing for a given org and month. This also recomputes the billing for all entities (VDC, vApp, and VMs) below the org.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        orgUuid - organization uuid
        rbs - RecomputeBillingSpec recompute billing spec

      • generateComplianceReports

        @POST
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/generate-compliance-reports")
void generateComplianceReports(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                String orgUuid,
                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="start")
                                                                                                Long start,
                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="end")
                                                                                                Long end,
                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="format")
                                                                                                String reportFormat)
        Generate compliance reports for the given organization and time range. If no time range is provided it will default to the last week. If no report format is given, it will default to PDF format.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - organization uuid
        start - start date
        end - end date
        reportFormat - report format "pdf" or "html"

      • emailHistoricalBillingReport

        @POST
 @Path(value="/vcd/{locationId}/email-billing-report")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
void emailHistoricalBillingReport(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                            String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                            EmailLocationBillingSpec spec)
        Email the given location historical email billing report for the given year and month.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        spec - EmailLocationBillingSpec email location billing spec

      • generateOrgCsvBillingReportNonDestructive

        @POST
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/generate-historical-billing-report")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
void generateOrgCsvBillingReportNonDestructive(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                    String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                    GenerateCSVBillingReportSpec spec)
        Generate an org CSV billing report for a given month non-destructively. This can be leveraged to see what kind of effects a back-calculation of org billing would have on a historical bill.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - organization uuid
        spec - GenerateCSVBillingReportSpec generate CSV billing report spec

                                                                                                       String locationId,
                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="taskUuid")
                                                                                                       String taskUuid)

        locationId - String locationId
        taskUuid - String taskUuid

      • search

        @GET
 @Path(value="/search")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
SearchResult search(@QueryParam(value="query")
                                                                                                              String query,
                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                              int offset,
                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                              int limit)
        Perform a full-text search of all entities.
        Parameters:
        query - query string

        The query string accepts Lucene style query input.


        For example to search for networks with IPs in the 10.10.10.X subnet you would supply '10.10.10.*' as a query string. Tht * represents a wildcard character and can be used anywhere in a query EXCEPT for as the first character.


        To search for multiple terms that MUST occur the AND operator can be used. E.g. to find documents containing both 'network' and 'vapp' you would supply the query string 'network AND vapp' .

        offset - page offset for return documents
        limit - limit to number of hits (default value is 10 and maximum is 50)
